name: Gebub's Adventure
description: Gebub finds himself in a large peaceful world, filled with colorful orbs and many creatures who need his help.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any modern processor clocked at 1.66 GHz and above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any modern graphics cards with 512 MB of VRAM and above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
